title: "Úloha 1: Preskúmanie dátových typov v R"
author: "Jakub"
format: html
execute:
  echo: true
  warning: false
  message: false
---

```{r}
## 1.1 Atomické typy

# Numerické hodnoty
teplota <- 23.5
gravitacia <- 9.8
polomer_km <- 6400.2
hodnotenie <- 4.7

# Celé čísla
mesiace <- as.integer(2)
mesta <- as.integer(12)
obyvatelia_miliony <- as.integer(50)

# Logické hodnoty
ma_vodu <- TRUE
je_obyvatelna <- TRUE

# Reťazce
nazov_planety <- "Kubova planeta"
oblast <- "region stropkov"
kategoria <- "majestatna"

cat("Planéta", nazov_planety, "v oblasti", oblast,
    "má", mesiace, "mesiace,",
    obyvatelia_miliony, "miliónov obyvateľov,",
    "teplotu", teplota, "°C a hodnotenie", hodnotenie, ".")
    
## 1.2 Vektory

vektor_numeric <- c(teplota, gravitacia, polomer_km, hodnotenie,
                    mesiace, mesta, obyvatelia_miliony)

vektor_sekvencia <- seq(20, 100, by = 5)

set.seed(1)
vektor_logicky <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), size = 10, replace = TRUE)

vektor_numeric
vektor_sekvencia
vektor_logicky

## 1.3 Matica

set.seed(123)
matica_planeta <- matrix(sample(-50:50, 9), nrow = 3, ncol = 3)

rownames(matica_planeta) <- c("Auroria", "Zephyria", "Lunara")
colnames(matica_planeta) <- c("Energia", "Zdroje", "Populácia")

matica_planeta
rowMeans(matica_planeta)
colMeans(matica_planeta)

## 1.4 Zoznam

zoznam_planeta <- list(
  atomicke = list(teplota, gravitacia, polomer_km, hodnotenie,
                  mesiace, mesta, obyvatelia_miliony,
                  ma_vodu, je_obyvatelna,
                  nazov_planety, oblast, kategoria),
  vektory = list(vektor_numeric, vektor_sekvencia, vektor_logicky),
  matica = matica_planeta,
  popis = "Kubova planeta je majestatna planéta v regione Stropkov s mestami a zdrojmi."
)

zoznam_planeta

## 1.5 Faktor

stadium_vyvoja <- factor(c("nízke", "stredné", "vysoké", "stredné", "vysoké", "nízke"),
                         levels = c("nízke", "stredné", "vysoké"))

table(stadium_vyvoja)

## 1.6 Dátový rámec

df_planeta <- data.frame(
  Mesto = c("Solara", "Nivara", "Celestria", "Orionis", "Velora", "Thalora"),
  Populacia_miliony = c(5, 8, 12, 7, 10, 8),
  Pobrežné = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE),
  Typ = c("hlavné", "priemyselné", "kultúrne", "výskumné", "obchodné", "obytné")
)

str(df_planeta)
summary(df_planeta)

df_planeta$Index_hustoty <- df_planeta$Populacia_miliony / 10
df_planeta
```

## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
